description: They always try to improve our products, and one thing we always put a lot of effort in, is fitting and shapes. Their icon product, the Voss Chevron Zip-Up, has been given a make-over for Fall/Winter 22/23.<br>They have made 3 panels in the front, which are a bit more narrow than previous seasons. This gives a more flattering shape. The fabric is the same as before, made in our special picqué knit, with yarns from the famous Tollegno spinner in Italy. Wear with the matching Voss Color Block leggings, for the slopes - Or even as a running outfit during cold days.
name: Voss Chevron Zip Up - Womens
